name: Pokemon RE:Call
summary: After becoming a Pokémon Trainer, you come back to Knot Island to reconnect with an old friend, Bill. As the good friend you are, you decide to help Bill with his mission, encountering many problems with the evil Team Rocket. Their boss, Giovanni, has hidden agendas with Pokémon, especially the unique Paradox Pokémon, which have energy from the past and future.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
